name: The Dwarven Defense
description:
Hordes of Orcs are assembling beneath The Forge Mines of Dregor. Even though outnumbered. The sparks of hope arise from the depths of the mountain.

Game Description: A game made in a GameAweek Jam.

The Dwarven Defense is a classic Invader like game with interactable  lava.

Music: Catalyst by Alexander Nakarada @thenakarada

(http://serpentsoundstudios.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License

Credits

A game by Sagar Shrestha (https://sagar-shrestha.itch.io/) and Luisa Enciso (https://luisaenciso.itch.io/) 

This game was created for the Game Design // UE course at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game a Week"  (Winter Semester 2020/2021)
